Name: Lovely Moments: Dad and daughter. Jigsaw Puzzle Game
About the game: There is no truer love than that of a dad for his daughter, and of a daughter for her daddy. Glimpse this wonderful relationship by playing these six super-cute scenes in this puzzle game about the daily life of fatherhood. Features Play 6 illustrated scenes in a very fun puzzle game 5 difficulty levels, for casual and hardcore gamers Secret mini-games, unlocked while you playing Beautiful characters, based on real life familyl Steam Achievements
